name: deep-learning-playground
description: Web Application where people new to Deep Learning can input a dataset and toy around with basic Pytorch modules through a drag and drop interface.

scripts.build:prod: cd frontend && yarn install && REACT_APP_MODE=prod yarn run build
scripts.installb: cd backend && poetry install && poetry shell && ggshield auth login && pre-commit install
scripts.installa: cd aws_write && poetry install && poetry shell && ggshield auth login && pre-commit install
scripts.secrets: cd backend && poetry run python -m aws_helpers.aws_secrets_utils.build_env
scripts.startb: cd backend && poetry run python driver.py
scripts.starta: cd aws_write && poetry run python app.py

author: https://github.com/DSGT-DLP/Deep-Learning-Playground/blob/main/CODEOWNERS
